name: Supersonic Stepping Exercise
description:
Challenge the limits of Stepping Exercise.
Can you exceed the supersonic speed?

- how to play -

1.Choose your favorite character on the start screen.
2.Touch the four buttons quickly to increase the score.

- Game Features -

1.Reproduce the Stepping Exercise with realistic 3D graphics.
2.Character changing function (Boy or Girl).
3.Various degrees from [E] to [SSS] that can be obtained by grades.
4.Easy operation, you can play in a short time.
